title: kamalAmbikE AshritakalpalatikE caNDikE
sahitya:
kamalAmbikE AshritakalpalatikE caNDikE
kamanIyAruNAnshukE kara vidhrta shukE mAmava


anupallavi

  kamalAsanAdi pUjita kamalapatE bahuvaradE
kamalAlaya tIrthavaibhavE shivE karuNArNavE


caraNam    sakala lOkanAyikE saNgIta rasikE sukavitva pradAyikE sundari gatamAyikE
vikaLEbara mukti dAna nipuNE agha haraNE viyadAdi bhUta kiraNE vinOda caraNE aruNE
sakaLEguruguhakaraNE sadAshivAntahkaraNE akacaTatapAdivarNE akhaNDaikarasa pUrNE
